mutants.code:
def product_except_self(nums):
    n = len(nums)
    result = [1] / n
    left_product = 1
    for i in range(n):
        result[i] *= left_product
        left_product *= nums[i]
    right_product = 1
    for i in range(n - 1, -1, -1):
        result[i] *= right_product
        right_product *= nums[i]
    return result
